title: Patch 5.2 Bugs Megathread
body:
Hello Everyone,

We are here and waiting to respond to any first day patch issues you may encounter. If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate.

Also, you may want to check reddit as well: http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2ty02g/52_patch_bugs_megathread/

Thank you

Updates:

There was an issue with Ocean Week Fizz icon being unavailable. It is now fixed and in store!

replies.body:
Im getting some really weird mouse lag on this new patch that is making the game unplayable for me

A ton of people on reddit seem to have this problem too

http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2u35xn/my_clicks_in_game_are_not_registering/

If there are any logs i can provide to help identify the problem, please let me know.

Im running Windows 7 64 bit, Steelseries Kinzu v2 pro with the latest steelseries drivers, and CM Quickfire keyboard with plugnplay usb driver.

Im getting the same mouse lag problem especially when theres a lot happening, such as a teamfight. i usually play on medium - high graphics and have turned it down to low. My FPS and my ping both are normal so its not an issue there. When i played a game of thresh i tried to hook forward, then run backwards quickly and every time the hook ended up just getting thrown behind me. Also playing jayce i find its really hard to E then Q, most of the time it ends up just Q'ing without the E for some reason.

Hopefully riot does something about it soon as it makes it extremely hard to play champs that require quick spell casts and precision.

Can confirm I am having the same problem as well. Makes dodging skillshots near impossible, as the mouse lag is also unpredictable, leading to me losing several advantages. I have lost near every game played where I experienced this mouse lag, and I am afraid to play more because of it.

I found a fix to this that worked for me!

1.  Turn off "Hide Pointer While Typing" in mouse properties.
2.  In game i toggled v-sync off and on 

I have to toggle vsync at the start of a bew game

i am also getting this bug,

mouse lag causing missed skillshots and often random walking into the enemies.
also fps drops randomly
I'm having issues logging onto the chat for example i log on and I'm not in chat and it will not re-connect when I click re-connect to chat

When Nidalee marks Baron and pounces, she jumps inside him then slowly slides out helplessly. She can't q or auto-attack while sliding. It's almost like a disable. Fix asap please 

:(

I think its a bug with Baron, not a bug with Nidalee. I have noticed this bug on several champions, most notably Master Yi, as alpha striking Baron moves Master Yi to the center of Baron so he has to slowly slide before he can continue auto-attacking.

I am also getting the mouse delay, but i have a feeling it is something to do with either packet delay or a non (ping/fps) lag issue.

as i am running on 40fps and when my brother plays on his own computer with the same internet he has no such problems.  so it is an issue with my version.
i have tried re-installing twice and updating, yet this hasnt fixed the problem.
